questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.Ma.8 anusār, jene Bhagwānnī prāpti thaī chhe ane gṛuhasthāshramī chhe to paṇ te shu kahevāy?
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Ma.8mā Bhagwānnī prāpti vāḷā gṛuhasthāshramīne paṇ nirguṇ kahevāy chhe.

questions.question_text: Vach.Ga.Ma.8 anusār, tyāgī hoy te paṇ shu kahevāy?
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Ma.8mā tyāgī hoy tene paṇ nirguṇ kahevāy chhe.

questions.question_text: Vach.Va.20 anusār, koṇī samajaṇ moṭī tene ja sauthee moṭo haribhakta jāṇavo?
questions.explanation: Vach.Va.20mā jenī samajaṇ moṭī tene ja sauthee moṭo haribhakta jāṇavo.

questions.question_text: Vach.Va.20 anusār, gṛuhī ane koṇo kāī meḷ nathī?
questions.explanation: Vach.Va.20mā gṛuhī ane tyāgīno kāī meḷ nathī.
